name: Audifense
description:
Audifense
A tower defense game with rhythm-based gameplay. Earn in-game money by killing enemies and pressing the right key when they die.
Keyboard Shortcuts:
ESC - Pause
R - Reset camera position
W - Move camera up
A - Move camera left
S - Move camera down
D - Move camera right
Left Arrow - Press when sound moves to the left
Right Arrow - Press when sound moves to the right
Mouse Controls:
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out
Mouse pointer - select
Game Engine: Unity 4
Sound Effects: CgMusic
3D Models: http://devassets.com/
This game is based from "How to make a Tower Defense Game" tutorial by Brackeys.
